title: Avoid adjoining classes
description: Avoid the use of adjoining classes, also called class chaining, look like '.foo.bar'.

title: Avoid regular expressions selectors
description: Avoid the use of regular expressions as selectors.

title: Avoid universal selector
description: Avoid the use of the universal selector.

title: Avoid unqualified attribute selectors
description: Avoid the use of unqualified attribute selectors.

title: Prohibit zero units
description: Prohibit the use of units with the value zero.

title: Avoid overqualified elements
description: Avoid the use of overqualified elements.

title: Enforce shorthand properties
description: Enforce the use of shorthand properties.

title: Prohibit duplicated background images
description: Prohibit the use of duplicated background images between selectors.

title: Prohibit broken box size
description: Don't use width or height when using padding or border.

title: Disallow use of box-sizing
description: The box-sizing properties isn't supported in IE6 and IE7.

title: Enforce @font-face syntax
description: Use the bulletproof @font-face syntax to avoid 404's in old versions of IE.

title: Enforce vendor prefixes
description: Include all compatible vendor prefixes to reach a wider range of users.

title: Require properties appropriate for display
description: Certain properties shouldn't be used with certain display property values.

title: Prohibit duplicate properties
description: Duplicate properties must appear one after the other.

title: Prohibit empty rules
description: Rules without any properties specified should be removed.

title: Prohibit syntax errors
description: There should be no syntax errors.

title: Enforce fallback colors
description: For older browsers that don't support RGBA, HSL, or HSLA, provide a fallback color.

title: Enforce gradient prefixes
description: When using a vendor-prefixed gradient, make sure to use them all.

title: Prohibit IDs in selectors
description: Selectors should not contain IDs.

title: Prohibit @import
description: Don't use @import, use <link> instead.

title: Prohibit !important
description: Be careful when using !important declaration.

title: Enforce known CSS3 properties
description: Properties should be known (listed in CSS3 specification) or be a vendor-prefixed property.

title: Prohibit outline: none
description: Use of outline: none or outline: 0 should be limited to :focus rules.

title: Prohibit qualified headings
description: Headings should not be qualified (namespaced).

title: Prohibit star prefix
description: Checks for the star property hack (targets IE6/7).

title: Prohibit negative text-indent
description: Checks for text indent less than -99px.

title: Prohibit underscore prefix
description: Checks for the underscore property hack (targets IE6).

title: Prohibit multiple headings
description: Headings should only be defined once.
